email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. I have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. My starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $48.00 per metric ton? Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.00 is still a bit high for us, but we can agree if you can extend the laytime to 96 hours. Also, can we cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day? Looking forward to your confirmation. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to extend the laytime to 96 hours and cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day. However, the freight rate will need to stay at $48.00 per metric ton to make this work. If this is acceptable, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds fair. Let’s proceed with $48.00 per metric ton, 96 hours laytime, and $18,000 per day demurrage. Please send over the draft agreement, and we’ll review it promptly. Thanks for your flexibility. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear we’re aligned. I’ll send over the draft charter party agreement later today. The laycan remains 15-20 October, and the vessel will be the MV Ocean Star. Let me know if you need anything else in the meantime. Best, Sarah
